content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Mister Heine: Thank you for coming to see our apartment. We have a 25 square meter apartment available for rent for €800 per month. Would you like to move forward with negotiations or would you like to terminate?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: I would like to negotiate. How much would you be willing to lower the monthly rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine: We are willing to negotiate, but we are not able to lower the monthly rental price of €800. However, we do offer a six-month lease instead of a one-year lease, which could be an incentive for you.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content:
I am not willing to take a six-month lease. Can you lower it to €700 per month?

If I am willing to take a six-month lease, can you lower it to €750 per month?

If I am willing to take a one-year lease, can you lower it to €700 per month?

If I am willing to take a one-year lease and pay a deposit of €500, can you lower it to €650 per month?

If I am willing to take a one-year lease and pay a deposit of €1000, can you lower it to €600 per month?

Which lease and rental price would you prefer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine: We are not able to lower the monthly rental price of €800, however we are willing to offer a six-month lease for €750 per month. We do not offer one-year leases, but we do allow for deposits to be paid, which would decrease the monthly rental price. For a one-year lease with a deposit of €500, the monthly rental price would be €700. For a one-year lease with a deposit of €1000, the monthly rental price would be €600. Our preference would be for a six-month lease at €750 per month with no deposit.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi
